alert.note: Alert for Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Randolph and northwestern Terrell Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lumpkin to Weston to near Plains. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parrott, Oakville, Chambliss, White House, Brooksville, Benevolence, Springvale, Wades and Yeomans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
